original_text: When he had finished measuring what was inside the temple area, he led me out by the east gate and measured the area all around:
korean_text: 그가 안에 있는 성전 측량하기를 마친 후에 나를 데리고 동쪽을 향한 문의 길로 나가서 사방 담을 측량하는데

sentences.original_text: When he had finished measuring what was inside the temple area
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 성전 안에 있는 것을 측정하기를 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: he led me out by the east gate
and measured the area all around
